problem_summary_simple: Find the first index where a given pattern matches in an infinite stream of bits.
problem_summary_technical: Utilizes KMP's prefix function to efficiently match a pattern against an unbounded stream of bits, reading one bit at a time.
key_insights: KMP's prefix function (LPS array) is crucial for avoiding redundant comparisons.
The algorithm processes the stream character by character, maintaining state for pattern matching.
The infinite nature of the stream means the search continues until a match is found.
